document.heading: Foster Care Goal Temporary Act of 1983

history.narrative: Law 5-4, the “Foster Care Goal Temporary Act of 1983,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-94, which was retained by Council. The Bill was adopted on the first and second readings on February 15, 1983, and March 15, 1983, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 24, 1983, it was assigned Act No. 5-18 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
